origin: The following steps have been tested for MacOSX (Mavericks) but should work with other versions as well.
local: 以下步骤已经针对MacOSX（Mavericks）进行了测试，但也应该适用于其他版本。

origin: Python 2.7 or later and Numpy 1.5 or later
local: Python 2.7或更高版本和Numpy 1.5或更高版本

origin: This tutorial will assume you have
OSX comes with Python 2.7 by default, you will need to install Python 3.8 if you want to use it specifically.
local: OSX默认附带Python2.7，如果您想专门使用它，则需要安装Python3.8。

origin: If you XCode and XCode Command Line-Tools installed, you already have git installed on your machine.
local: 如果您安装了XCode和XCode命令行工具，那么您的计算机上已经安装了git。

origin: Find the version for your system and download CMake from their release's
local: 找到适合您系统的版本并从他们的发行版下载CMake

origin: Install the dmg package and launch it from Applications. That will give you the UI app of CMake
local: 安装dmg包并从应用程序启动它。这将为您提供CMake的UI应用程序

origin: From the CMake app window, choose menu Tools –> How to Install For Command Line Use. Then, follow the instructions from the pop-up there.
local: 从“CMake应用程序”窗口中，选择“菜单”“工具”&ndash&燃气轮机；如何安装以供命令行使用。然后，按照弹出窗口中的说明进行操作。

origin: Install folder will be /usr/bin/ by default, submit it by choosing Install command line links.
local: 安装文件夹默认为/usr/bin/，通过选择Install command line links提交。

origin: Test that it works by running
You can use the latest stable OpenCV version or you can grab the latest snapshot from our
local: 您可以使用最新稳定的OpenCV版本，也可以从我们的

origin: Getting the Latest Stable OpenCV Version
Download the source archive and unpack it.
local: 下载源文件并将其解包。

origin: Getting the Cutting-edge OpenCV from the Git Repository
local: 从Git存储库获取最前沿的OpenCV

origin: Building OpenCV from Source Using CMake

local: 保持源代码目录干净是一个好的做法。在源树外创建生成目录。
